ability.name: Coordinated Execution
ability.flavor: You direct your ally to make a killing blow.
ability.trigger: The target uses an ability to deal rolled damage to a creature while hidden.

metadata.flavor: You direct your ally to make a killing blow.

effects.effect: If the target of the triggering ability is not a leader or solo creature, they are reduced to 0 Stamina. If the target of the triggering ability is a minion, the entire squad is killed. If the target of the triggering ability is a leader or solo creature, the triggering ability's power roll automatically obtains a tier 3 outcome.
